attributes.action: Get free equipment to gather rain water, to use as tiolet water to aid reduction of green house gas
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Free equipment for houses to gather rain water, for the use in our toilet systems, this will help the enviroment

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence –
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/savingwater/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
